select id, name, locale, path, pid, icon, priority, hide_in_menu, hide_children_in_menu, props, description, created_by, created_date, last_modified_by, last_modified_date from sys_menu
where pid = #{pid}
where pid is null
order by priority

select m.id, m.name, m.locale, m.path, m.pid, m.icon, m.priority, m.hide_in_menu, m.hide_children_in_menu, m.props, m.description, m.created_by, m.created_date, m.last_modified_by, m.last_modified_date from sys_menu m inner join sys_role_menu srm on srm.role_id = #{roleId} and m.id = srm.menu_id

select id, name, locale, path, pid, icon, priority, hide_in_menu, hide_children_in_menu, props, description, created_by, created_date, last_modified_by, last_modified_date from sys_menu order by priority

select distinct m.id, m.name, m.locale, m.path, m.pid, m.icon, m.priority, m.hide_in_Menu, m.hide_children_in_menu, m.props, m.description, m.created_by, m.created_date, m.last_modified_by, m.last_modified_date from sys_menu m
inner join sys_role_menu srm on srm.menu_id = m.id inner join sys_role r on r.id = srm.role_id inner join sys_user_role sur on sur.user_id = #{userId} and r.id = sur.role_id
